scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence includes: a 1918 postcard from a WWI Army inductee, for whom a 10-year-old Harriette Simpson apparently mailed a letter; two 1921 summertime letters from a former classmate at the Stanton Academy; several letters from the Kentucky Federation of Women's Clubs concerning student loans to Simpson during her studies at the University of Louisville.
